items.title: Huge blast at key Iranian port kills 18 and injures 800
items.description: One maritime risk firm says it believes the affected containers held solid fuel for use in ballistic missiles.

items.title: 'Number of people' dead after car driven into crowd in Canada, police say
items.description: A number of people have been killed and injured in an incident at a street festival in Vancouver, police say.

items.title: Titanic survivor's letter sold for £300,000 at auction
items.description: Colonel Archibald Gracie's letter from onboard the ill-fated ocean liner has been described as "prophetic".

items.title: The price of love - the doctor who has South Africa talking about financial abuse
items.description: A medic sparks a national conversation about the financial abuse some female breadwinners face.

items.title: A stunning reversal of fortunes in Canada's historic election
items.description: After a campaign upended by Trump’s threats, the Liberals hope they can hold onto power.
